member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadRichTextBox.SuspendUpdateLayout
member.summary: This method supports control infrastructure and is not intended for use directly from your code. Suspends layout updates forced by document editing operations (e.g. multiple insert/delete operations). Each call to to this method should be followed by a call to method.
member.remarks: Use this method when you have to do sequence of updates to the document, to improve performance and avoid unnecessary layout and UI updates.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.Styles.StyleDefinition.LinkedStyleName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the linked style.
member.remarks: This property can be set to Paragraph or Character style only. Paragraph style can be linked only to Character style and vice versa. StyleDefinition would obtain the corresponding property values from the linked style. Either LinkedStyle or LinkedStyleName can be specified. If BasedOnName is specified BasedOn StyleDefinition would be set automatically if this style definition is added to a document StyleRepository that contains StyleDefinition with corresponding Name.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.Styles.StyleDefinition.LinkedStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets linked StyleDefinition. Only Paragraph and Character types of styles can be linked
member.remarks: This property can be set to Paragraph or Character style only. Paragraph style can be linked only to Character style and vice versa. StyleDefinition would obtain the corresponding property values from the linked style. Either LenkedStyle or LinkedStyleName can be specified. If BasedOnName is specified BasedOn StyleDefinition would be set automatically if this style definition is added to a document StyleRepository that contains StyleDefinition with corresponding Name.
